utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ready?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: it's...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Rachel...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: and…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe’s...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: please...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: leave...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: leave…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait, I-I just said "leave."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I know because you have all the good words. What do I get? I get "it’s," "and" oh I'm sorry, I have "A." Forget it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, come on that's silly.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, so let's switch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I have all of the good words. OK, fine, fine, we can switch.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Everybody…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Rachel…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: and…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe’s…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please...wait, how did you do that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, you're no ordinary roommate are you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, come on can we finish this later? Cause I wanna go running before it gets dark. Oh! Why don't you come with me?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, it'll be fun. We'll run in the park. It'll be like our first y’know roommate bonding thing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, let's go running!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah and there's really cute guys there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Let's run towards them!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OK!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, wait just one more second. Hi, it's Phoebe and Rachel's. Please leave a message, thanks!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now wait a minute. You just took all the words!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh. You've met your match Rachel Green.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, I just finished this fascinating book. By the year 2030, there'll be computers that can carry out the same amount of functions as an actual human brain. So theoretically you could download your thoughts and memories into this computer and-and-and live forever as a machine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I just realized I can sleep with my eyes open.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross and Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, that's a great idea nailing the boxes to the floor!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I didn't nail the boxes to the floor.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, So you can move them!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, and while I'm doing that, Ross has a great computer story for you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey everybody! Uh, I'd like you to meet Janine. She's-she's gonna be my new roommate!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Hi

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, she's gonna live with me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's nice to meet you. Janine...?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Lecroix. Janine Lecroix

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I didn't know that! Well, what a pretty last name!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, uh, wh-where ya from?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Australia, I just moved here a couple of weeks ago.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: From the land down under? I didn't know that either!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So uh, wha-uh, what do you do?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: I'm a dancer.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're a dancer? She-she's a dancer!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well, I think I'll go and unpack.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey let me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, did you even interview this woman before you asked her to move in?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Of course I did.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-huh, what exactly did you ask her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "When can you move in?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you for bringing her into our lives.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Unbelievable

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, so you like her too Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, look at all the boxes!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ugh, I cannot wait to ask her out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute...Joey. Joey you can't ask her out, she's your roommate. It-it'll be way too complicated.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah man don't do it. I mean if you date her, then-then-then I can't date her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, think about it. Now remember when you were going out with that girl Donna and you guys broke up. Remember how horrible it was when you guys bumped into each other at the supermarket?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh God, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now imagine you live at the supermarket.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, Oh, you're right! I don't want that. I can't date her!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah and you better watch the flirting too, cause you know, in such close quarters, it could be trouble.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, that's gonna be tough Mon. I mean it's hard for me to be around an attractive woman and not flirt.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hmm, well you're around me all the time and you don't flirt.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You a little sad about that sweetheart?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I have to tie my shoe, so you go ahead, I'll catch up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Come on! That's not running! Let's go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You guys, I'm telling you, when she runs, she looks like a cross between Kermit The Frog and The Six Million Dollar Man.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica had such a crush on him. Yeah, she used to kiss his poster every night before she went to bed.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! I used to do that too!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did you also have his album, It's Not Easy Being Green?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aw, Mon...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, Phoebe runs weird huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah and you know what, I know she's gonna wanna run again, I just don't know how to get out of it, I mean, I live with her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't you just be straight with her? Tell her the truth.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You're right, you're right. I should just tell her the truth.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pheebs, Monica tripped me, I don't think I can ever run again, ever!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why? Why would you do that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't know. Rachel I'm-I'm sorry that I hurt your ankles.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ankle.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We'll see.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: OK, I'm officially unpacked. Thanks for helping me man. Joe? Well, I guess Joey went home. Oh and look, there's still one box that I have to unpack.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I Gotcha!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God! You-almost-gave-me-a-heart-attack.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Boy, it was so hard not to laugh, I tell ya. Hey, hey, the place looks great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, not bad right? You know what, Monica’s gonna be working late, so I'm gonna make this place spotless. You know what else I'm gonna do, know what else I'm gonna do? I'm gonna go downstairs, I'm gonna get her some flowers. Now who wouldn't wanna live with me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't! No, I wanna live with the super-hot Australian dancer.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, now how's that going though? Are you okay with the not-flirting thing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Well, so far yeah. But it's tough you know? I got all this built up flirting energy and I don't know how to get rid of it. How you doin?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohhhh man

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Sorry, there's just more room out here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no, it's-it's uh, you just uh, uh reminded me that uh, I need to do my stretches too.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Why don't you try to do-

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: What's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-uh nothing. I-I-I-I didn't want you to touch me cause I'm -I'm all sweaty from the workout. I better hit the shower. Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Oh, sorry about that stuff hanging in there. It's just my thongs are too delicate for the dryer.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi! Oh yeah, uh-huh, it's me. I saw you grab your running shoes this morning and sneak out. You lied so you could run by yourself.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no Phoebe no, I was...no. You know what, I was, I was actually just checking to, see, if I could run. And I can!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please Rachel, I am not an idiot.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, wait Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, couples who live together do start to look alike. So, Mondler...uh, what uh, what ‘cha doin?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What does it look like I'm doing? I am cleaning!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you get Monica's authorization to move all of her stuff?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Authorization? I don't need that. I'm gonna put everything back.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Put it back exactly where you found it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes I'm gonna put it back exactly where I found it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ‘Kay, first of all, this attitude is not helping.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She's not gonna care if I put her stuff back in the same stupid place.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa, hello, did you just meet Monica?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She is gonna recognize that I did a nice thing and-and, appreciate it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm -you know, actually this'll work out well. Cause when you have to move back in with Joey, Joey's hot new roommate can come and live with me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I see, I see, y-y-you're trying to freak me out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look Chandler, Monica is really weird about this kind stuff all right. Believe me, I lived with her for 16 years. She is going to freak…out. Oh my God, she's going to sit on you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, she's not okay? And I'll prove it to you. I'm gonna call her right now. Phone's done ehh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Mon, how's it going?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Terrible. If-if I want something done right, I have to do it myself. Other people just wreck stuff. I really think I might kill someone tonight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh come on, come on, it can't be that bad.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's worse. The only thing that's getting me through is knowing that I'm gonna be seeing you soon. I think I may even try to get out of here early.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! No-no-no-no-no-no. It sounds like they really need you down there.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, are you just hanging out with Ross?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's, all good! Okay bye-bye Mon! She's-she's gonna kill me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, the phone was facing the other way. And that goes back up there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We should start with the big stuff. Y’know? That'll be the easiest. Uh, let's start with the couch. I got it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah that-that, doesn't look right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you talking about? The couch is perfectly in line with the carpet. And then I can just walk over here and casually just put my feet right up on the... OK, OK, here's what we do, we just uh, move the couch closer to the coffee table.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa, whoa, but then the back of the couch won't line up with he back of the carpet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: OK well here, we'll just move the coffee table closer to the couch.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa, Whoa, Whoa, but then the coffee table won't be centered in the seating area.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, but the coffee table doesn't match the...blahebdmsdlkhdyslkd;btyds...Rooosss!!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, what am I gonna do? I'm not flirting but still, I'm drawing her to me like - like a moth to a flame! What the hell's going on over here?!?!? Monica's gonna kill you! Look I need your help, I have to do something to-to repel this woman! Wait a minute, wait a minute, you guys repel women all the time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I've been married 3 times

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no I've seen it happen, you-you get a rapport going with a woman but somehow you manage to kill it. What's your secret?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, we do not repel women OK? That is completely untrue.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no, yes we do my man. Remember when we were back in college and we went to that spring dance and you walked right up to that girl you liked and you could not stop talking about the Irish potato famine?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well what about you? You weren't you know, so hot in college either. After everything he said, he'd go "ba dum bum chessh"

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, Monica doesn't like that either, Maybe I should stop doing that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh y'know what, girls don't like it when I start talking about science.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's not specific to girls.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is great, this is great, what else, what else?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, they don't like it when you correct their grammar.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And they don't like it when you explain why your jokes are funny.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: They don't like it when you keep asking them if they like you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Man, I'm so lucky I have Monica.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm never gonna find love again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Phoebe, can I talk to you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, um, I... All right Phoebe look, I just wanted to say that I'm sorry. OK? I handled the situation horribly and I should not have lied to you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, what should you have done?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I-I should've told you the truth.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-Huh, Which is...?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y'know, the reason I didn't wanna go running with you is because um, well y'know the way that you run is a little...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it's embarrassing. People were looking at us like we were crazy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why do you care?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because they're people.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But people that you don't know and will never see again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, but still. They're people…with eyes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I didn't get embarrassed running next to Miss . But no, okay. No, no, I can see why running with me would be embarrassing to you. Yeah, okay. You're uptight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I am not uptight—Hey-hey-hey-oh-oh! Listen, I am not uptight, man.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's okay Rachel. I'm not judging you; that's just who you are. Me. I'm more free y'know? I run like I did when I was a kid, cause that's the only way it's fun. Y'know, I mean didn’t you ever run so fast you thought your legs were gonna fall off? Y'know, like when you were like running towards the swings or running away from Satan? The neighbor's dog.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, is this lamp in the same place?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who cares? I repel women.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no-no-no-no!!! You can't come in here! R-r-r-r-Ross is naked.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I couldn't say that I was naked because she's allowed too see me naked.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why does anyone have to be naked?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why is Ross naked?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I-I had to show Chandler something?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Naked?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah I uh, I have a uh, a guy problem.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is it the same thing that Chandler had?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, uh, just come later, we'll get everything squared away and you can come back later.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, listen, there's still some of Chandler's medicine under the sink in the bathroom. Bye!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bye! Thank God

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, what'd you have?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, we have no time okay? We must focus. We gotta get everything back into its original place.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The photo album! There were millions of pictures of the apartment in the photo album. We just go through it and match everything to the pictures.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's perfect! That's brilliant!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So really, what'd ya have?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Hey Joey, I got some beer for you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, don't you mean "for whom?"

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Sure, listen I was gonna order some pizza, you wanna share one?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pizza, heh, its not like I never had that before...ba dum bum cheshhh.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Is there something wrong?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, All right, let's just get this out in the open okay? You're hot. I'm lovable. Clearly there's a vibe going on between us. But, we're roommates and it's a huge mistake for us to continue down this road.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Joey...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, no, I'm telling ya. Imagine yourself living in a supermarket and you will understand okay? So the question is, what do we do?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well, I don't think there is anything to do. I mean I think you're really sweet, but I'm just not interested in you like that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: No! I mean you're a really nice guy and I'm happy to be your roommate and your friend, I'm just y'know, I just don't feel that way about you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! I see what happened. It's because I was trying to repel you. Right? Believe me, you'd feel a lot different if I turned it on.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: I don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I do. How you doin?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: I'm OK

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!?!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh dear God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh honey, I'm so sorry, you were right, this feels great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: See? And you don't care if people are staring, it's just for a second cause then you're gone!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Gone! I mean its amazing Pheebs. I feel so free and so graceful. Hey! Look out for the horse! Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is it okay for me to come in now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-huh

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why is everything different?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I don't see anything different other than the fact that the room got so much brighter when you came into it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, the end table is wrong, The couch looks bizarre and don't even get me started on the refrigerator magnets.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay look, don't...don't be mad okay? But after I unpacked the boxes I wanted to do something nice for you, so, I-I-I cleaned the apartment. So I moved everything around and then I forgot where it, where it went back and I'm sorry, I'm very sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's okay. Chandler, are you afraid of me or something?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you want me to be afraid of you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Of course not. I mean gosh, Chandler what you did, it's, it's a wonderful thing and I really appreciate it. I know I have this weird thing where I want everything to be in the perfect place, but I'd never expect you to worry about that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Of course!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh well you're the best. You come here to me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, hold on okay? First thing's first. Okay, now did Ross sit anywhere while he was naked?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So it said that by the year 2030, there'll be computers that can carry out the same number of functions as an actual human brain. So theoretically we could download our thoughts and our memories into this computer...

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: ...and live forever as a machine!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's so Janine, you-you-you know what, do you know we're doing right now? You and I, we're interfacing.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Yeah, I gotta go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ba dum bumb cheshhh!
